titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lord-Mayor, the aldermen and governours of the several hospitals of the city of London, at St. Bridgets Church, on Wednesday in Easter week, 1698 being one of the anniversary spittle-sermons / by Tho. Lynford ...
titleStmt.author: Lynford, Thomas, 1650-1724.

notesStmt.note: Caption and running title: A spittle-sermon preached before the Lord-Mayor.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
